price: Nígbà tí Mo bá ṣe é tó dọ́gba jálẹ̀ tán, tí Mo sì fẹ́ nínú atẹ́gùn ẹ̀mí tí Mo dá sínú rẹ̀, nígbà náà ẹ dojú bolẹ̀ fún un, kí ẹ forí kanlẹ̀ kí i.”
arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqaʿū lahu sājidīna
